article.headline: Charting the S&P 500's persistently wild 2020 ride
article.body: U.S. stocks are higher early Thursday, rising amid market-friendly Federal Reserve policy language. In the process, the S&P 500 and Nasdaq Composite have extended decisive breaks to record territory - clearing the 20-day volatility bands - while the Dow industrials have concurrently spiked to six-month highs. Before detailing the U.S. markets'...
